title: On Little Wings by Regina Sirois
description:
This is a story of the countless ways we get love wrong. And why, despite every disappointment, we keep fighting to get it right.

When a family is torn apart by death, two sisters take violently divergent paths and the story of their family appears to end terribly and abruptly. Two decades later Jennifer never dreams that the photo she finds stuck between the pages of a neglected book will tear open a gaping wound to her motherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s secret past. Abandoning her comfortable life with her parents and best friend in the wheat fields of Nebraska, JenniferÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s quest for a hidden aunt leads her to the untamed coast of Maine where she struggles to understand why her mother lied to her for sixteen years.

The stories, varied, hilarious, and heartbreaking, unfold to paint a striking mural of the shattered past. As Jennifer seeks to piece together her motherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s story, she inadvertently writes one for herself.
